fields.description:
create table src (key string, value string);
create table src1 (key string, value string);

select count(*) from (
select /+mapjoin(b)/ a.*
from src a
join 
src1 b
on a.key=b.key
where a.key=48
union all
select /+mapjoin(bb)/ aa.*
from src aa
join 
src1 bb
on aa.key=bb.key
where aa.key=100
) t;
